com.here.android.mpa.tce

Class TollCostResult

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.tce.TollCostResult

  • public final class TollCostResult
extends java.lang.Object
    Represent result of TollCostRequest. This class wrap different toll costs.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.math.BigDecimal> getTollCostByCountry()
      Gets the toll cost for each country the route traverses.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.math.BigDecimal> getTollCostByTollSystemName()
      Gets the toll cost for each toll system the route traverses.
      java.math.BigDecimal getTotalTollCost()
      Gets the total toll cost of given Route.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getTotalTollCost

        public java.math.BigDecimal getTotalTollCost()
        Gets the total toll cost of given Route.
        Returns:
        total toll cost in the specified TollCostOptions.setCurrency(String) currency. Default currency is EUR.

      • getTollCostByCountry

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.math.BigDecimal> getTollCostByCountry()
        Gets the toll cost for each country the route traverses.
        Returns:
        A map of ISO ALPHA-3 country code and toll cost in the specified TollCostOptions.setCurrency(String) currency. Default currency is EUR.

      • getTollCostByTollSystemName

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.math.BigDecimal> getTollCostByTollSystemName()
        Gets the toll cost for each toll system the route traverses.

        Please note that the toll system names will not be localized.

        Returns:
        A map of toll system name and toll cost in the specified TollCostOptions.setCurrency(String) currency. Default currency is EUR.
